name: basted-pocket
description: AI-Enhanced Recipe Collection - Your GitOps-powered read-it-later service

scripts.build: bun run scripts/scrapeContent.ts && bun run scripts/enrichContent.ts && bun run scripts/generateSite.ts
scripts.serve: cd dist && python3 -m http.server 8000 || python3 -m http.server 8001 || python3 -m http.server 8002
scripts.deploy: bun run build && echo 'Site built! Deploy dist/ folder to your hosting service.'
